channel.title: CirnoPK - A unique storkpk based server! [5 months running, stable economy]
channel.description:
Finally, a stork-style server is back up again! With plenty of new content too. If you're interested in video footage of our server's gameplay we have plenty on our youtube channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/cirnoPK)
Also, need to get in touch with an admin? Contact us on Skype: cirnopk [at] live [dot] com
[b]How you can get started:[/b]
-Go to [url=http://cirnopk.com]CirnoPK[/url] and [url=http://cirnopk.com/register.php]Register[/url] -Click on [url=http://cirnopk.com/accountmanager.php]control panel[/url], then [url=http://cirnopk.com/registerchar.php]Create CirnoPK Account[/url] -Click on the account you registered and set your starting points to the stats you prefer -Finally Click on client to download it and log-in using the character account you just created
[b]Synopsis of features:[/b]
-Kill Saradomin! Event [img]http://i.imgur.com/NC5iLTq.jpg[/img] [img]http://cirnopk.com/event_arena.png[/img] -Xp rates are 6x for non subscribers 8x for subs outside wilderness, 14x and 16x inside wild -98.8% uptime -Clan system with clan wars and territory--Subscriber xp at the territory for winning it. -Dm Arena -Staking -Max Stat 125 -Pk only stats -Web client -Customize your looks
[b]Our Cpanel[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6EQnEmf.jpg[/img]
[b]MANY unique skins for your characters![/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DeRheFW.jpg[/img]
[b]What each new player starts with:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OBOjjwy.jpg[/img]
[b]Some of our custom training areas include:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jKx7bY8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/50Z0pJZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/45HGw6n.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Do7f6Y2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5DxMv4Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/a0fSxog.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EeN0nXb.jpg[/img]

item.title: CirnoPK - A unique storkpk based server! [5 months running, stable economy]
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“CirnoPK Support, post:14, topic:541591”][quote author=Ix Andrew link=topic=660461.msg4417418#msg4417418 date=1396574580]

What do you mean by stable economy? Rares that you sold for cash and also every deals you did under the table = stable economy? Wow… OK

Tired of the slander towards every RSC server (except Rscr, which you act like a total fanboy of in most of your posts)… By stable economy, we mean the items have VALUE. For example, when players PK, they actually feel a sense of reward since hyperinflation hasn’t taken over this server, like it has others. (this is pretty refreshing, for an RSC server)

Also, we are able to cover the server costs and other expenses through our supporter passes, our donation items, and the infusion of funds from staff members. (which are ALL posted in their respective threads in the Announcements section) Since we keep a transparent record of the rares that are implemented into the game through donations, there can’t be any confusion about how many rares are in-game, how many colors, and we also show the donator’s in-game name unless they request to remain anonymous.

Every rare that is able to be donated for (masks and party hats) are priced identically. Also, the fact that we stand firm on our donation price of $39.50 (instead of just taking as many lower offers as we can get) is a good indication that we aren’t simply trying to sell as many pixels as possible.

Countless players have asked to buy (for USD) blood runes, dragon meds n sqs, god staffs/capes, points, or just flats. However, they have all been turned down. To any reasonable/rational person, this shows we are running this server to make an enjoyable game/community and not for the $$$. Enough thread derailing, iBoss. However, I forgive you for being misinformed. I’ll give you the benefit of the doubt and assume you weren’t intentionally trying to slander CirnoPK with a lot of your posts.

Feel free to hop on CirnoPK and you, too, can personally experience our stable economy (as opposed to the other ridiculously inflated servers)

This will be the last time I bother addressing baseless accusations in this official advertising thread for CirnoPK. If you feel like making claims, fine, but if you expect a response or for anyone to take you seriously, post PROOF. Oh wait, that’s impossible seeing as your accusations are frivolous. It’s probably time you just deleted all of your posts and your account (if possible) on Moparscape in order to avoid further embarrassment/ridicule.

Now, lets get back to discussing the real issue here, CirnoPK. We had 16 players online simultaneously earlier this morning. Our player count, after dipping for a bit, is beginning to steadily climb back up over the last week or so, at least. I’ve also got an advertising strategy mapped out. Additionally, I’ve kick started CirnoPK’s advertising budget with $50 of my own personal money. 100% of the proceeds from the next donation item (mask or p hat) will be added to the advertising budget (currently at $50). After we’ve raised at least $100 to spend on advertising, we will no longer put 100% of the money from a donation item into our advertising budget. Instead, a fraction of the donation will go toward advertising while the rest sits in savings to ensure we always have enough cash on hand to pay for our (somewhat pricey) dedicated server, DDoS mitigation service, and any other unanticipated expenses.

16 players? This server peaked at a much higher player count months ago. What happened?
[/quote]
Our population dipped for a while, but the last month has seen a decent improvement as far as consistent player counts. We’ve also begun to host more events in game.[/quote]I played this for a few days when it first came out.
You might want to do something about asshole players, since that’s why I left.
Not flaming, plz gaise

Read full topic

item.title: CirnoPK - A unique storkpk based server! [5 months running, stable economy]
item.dc:creator: @CirnoPK_Support CirnoPK Support
item.description:
@CirnoPK_Support wrote:

[quote=“Ix Andrew, post:13, topic:541591”][quote author=CirnoPK Support link=topic=660461.msg4417174#msg4417174 date=1396451744]

What do you mean by stable economy? Rares that you sold for cash and also every deals you did under the table = stable economy? Wow… OK

Tired of the slander towards every RSC server (except Rscr, which you act like a total fanboy of in most of your posts)… By stable economy, we mean the items have VALUE. For example, when players PK, they actually feel a sense of reward since hyperinflation hasn’t taken over this server, like it has others. (this is pretty refreshing, for an RSC server)

Also, we are able to cover the server costs and other expenses through our supporter passes, our donation items, and the infusion of funds from staff members. (which are ALL posted in their respective threads in the Announcements section) Since we keep a transparent record of the rares that are implemented into the game through donations, there can’t be any confusion about how many rares are in-game, how many colors, and we also show the donator’s in-game name unless they request to remain anonymous.

Every rare that is able to be donated for (masks and party hats) are priced identically. Also, the fact that we stand firm on our donation price of $39.50 (instead of just taking as many lower offers as we can get) is a good indication that we aren’t simply trying to sell as many pixels as possible.

Countless players have asked to buy (for USD) blood runes, dragon meds n sqs, god staffs/capes, points, or just flats. However, they have all been turned down. To any reasonable/rational person, this shows we are running this server to make an enjoyable game/community and not for the $$$. Enough thread derailing, iBoss. However, I forgive you for being misinformed. I’ll give you the benefit of the doubt and assume you weren’t intentionally trying to slander CirnoPK with a lot of your posts.

Feel free to hop on CirnoPK and you, too, can personally experience our stable economy (as opposed to the other ridiculously inflated servers)

This will be the last time I bother addressing baseless accusations in this official advertising thread for CirnoPK. If you feel like making claims, fine, but if you expect a response or for anyone to take you seriously, post PROOF. Oh wait, that’s impossible seeing as your accusations are frivolous. It’s probably time you just deleted all of your posts and your account (if possible) on Moparscape in order to avoid further embarrassment/ridicule.

Now, lets get back to discussing the real issue here, CirnoPK. We had 16 players online simultaneously earlier this morning. Our player count, after dipping for a bit, is beginning to steadily climb back up over the last week or so, at least. I’ve also got an advertising strategy mapped out. Additionally, I’ve kick started CirnoPK’s advertising budget with $50 of my own personal money. 100% of the proceeds from the next donation item (mask or p hat) will be added to the advertising budget (currently at $50). After we’ve raised at least $100 to spend on advertising, we will no longer put 100% of the money from a donation item into our advertising budget. Instead, a fraction of the donation will go toward advertising while the rest sits in savings to ensure we always have enough cash on hand to pay for our (somewhat pricey) dedicated server, DDoS mitigation service, and any other unanticipated expenses.
[/quote]

16 players? This server peaked at a much higher player count months ago. What happened?[/quote]
Our population dipped for a while, but the last month has seen a decent improvement as far as consistent player counts. We’ve also begun to host more events in game.

Read full topic

Countless players have asked to buy (for USD) blood runes, dragon meds n sqs, god staffs/capes, points, or just flats. However, they have all been turned down. To any reasonable/rational person, this shows we are running this server to make an enjoyable game/community and not for the $$$. Enough thread derailing, iBoss. Feel free to hop on CirnoPK and you, too, can personally experience our stable economy (as opposed to the other ridiculously inflated servers)

This will be the last time I bother addressing baseless accusations in this official advertising thread for CirnoPK. item.title: CirnoPK - A unique storkpk based server! [5 months running, stable economy]
item.dc:creator: @CirnoPK_Support CirnoPK Support
item.description:
@CirnoPK_Support wrote:

iBoss:

What do you mean by stable economy? Rares that you sold for cash and also every deals you did under the table = stable economy? Wow… OK

Tired of the slander towards every RSC server (except Rscr, which you act like a total fanboy of in most of your posts)… By stable economy, we mean the items have VALUE. For example, when players PK, they actually feel a sense of reward since hyperinflation hasn’t taken over this server, like it has others. (this is pretty refreshing, for an RSC server)

Also, we are able to cover the server costs and other expenses through our supporter passes, our donation items, and the infusion of funds from staff members. (which are ALL posted in their respective threads in the Announcements section) Since we keep a transparent record of the rares that are implemented into the game through donations, there can’t be any confusion about how many rares are in-game, how many colors, and we also show the donator’s in-game name unless they request to remain anonymous.

Every rare that is able to be donated for (masks and party hats) are priced identically. Also, the fact that we stand firm on our donation price of $39.50 (instead of just taking as many lower offers as we can get) is a good indication that we aren’t simply trying to sell as many pixels as possible.

Countless players have asked to buy (for USD) blood runes, dragon meds n sqs, god staffs/capes, points, or just flats. However, they have all been turned down. To any reasonable/rational person, this shows we are running this server to make an enjoyable game/community and not for the $$$. Enough thread derailing, iBoss. However, I forgive you for being misinformed. I’ll give you the benefit of the doubt and assume you weren’t intentionally trying to slander CirnoPK with a lot of your posts.

Feel free to hop on CirnoPK and you, too, can personally experience our stable economy (as opposed to the other ridiculously inflated servers)

This will be the last time I bother addressing baseless accusations in this official advertising thread for CirnoPK. If you feel like making claims, fine, but if you expect a response or for anyone to take you seriously, post PROOF. Oh wait, that’s impossible seeing as your accusations are frivolous. It’s probably time you just deleted all of your posts and your account (if possible) on Moparscape in order to avoid further embarrassment/ridicule.

Now, lets get back to discussing the real issue here, CirnoPK. We had 16 players online simultaneously earlier this morning. Our player count, after dipping for a bit, is beginning to steadily climb back up over the last week or so, at least. I’ve also got an advertising strategy mapped out. Additionally, I’ve kick started CirnoPK’s advertising budget with $50 of my own personal money. 100% of the proceeds from the next donation item (mask or p hat) will be added to the advertising budget (currently at $50). After we’ve raised at least $100 to spend on advertising, we will no longer put 100% of the money from a donation item into our advertising budget. Instead, a fraction of the donation will go toward advertising while the rest sits in savings to ensure we always have enough cash on hand to pay for our (somewhat pricey) dedicated server, DDoS mitigation service, and any other unanticipated expenses.

Read full topic

item.title: CirnoPK - A unique storkpk based server! [5 months running, stable economy]
item.dc:creator: @CirnoPK_Support CirnoPK Support
item.description:
@CirnoPK_Support wrote:

Finally, a stork-style server is back up again! With plenty of new content too. If you’re interested in video footage of our server’s gameplay we have plenty on our youtube channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/cirnoPK)

Also, need to get in touch with an admin? Contact us on Skype: cirnopk [at] live [dot] com

How you can get started:

-Go to CirnoPK and Register
-Click on control panel, then Create CirnoPK Account
-Click on the account you registered and set your starting points to the stats you prefer
-Finally Click on client to download it and log-in using the character account you just created

Synopsis of features:

-Kill Saradomin! Event


-Xp rates are 6x for non subscribers 8x for subs outside wilderness, 14x and 16x inside wild
-98.8% uptime
-Clan system with clan wars and territory–Subscriber xp at the territory for winning it.
-Dm Arena
-Staking
-Max Stat 125
-Pk only stats
-Web client
-Customize your looks

Our Cpanel

MANY unique skins for your characters!

What each new player starts with:

Some of our custom training areas include:






Read full topic
item.source: CirnoPK - A unique storkpk based server! [5 months running, stable economy]
